tourName: Lalibela, Omo Valley and Danakil tour, Ethopia
generalInfo: On this tour you will have an opportunity to explore the most significant Ethiopian tourist destinations in only 8 days. Optional add-on: Lalibela – Omo Valley – Danakil via Mekelle & Tigray Churches. Modify your itinerary to explore the scenic route through Mekelle and the Tigray region. You'll visit the ancient Tigray rock-hewn churches and learn about their history and architecture. You will enhance your cultural journey by combining Lalibela, Omo Valley and Danakil in one seamless experience.

dayInfo.description: Fly from Addis Ababa to Lalibela Morning: Depart from Addis Ababa and fly to Lalibela. Afternoon: Arrive in Lalibela and check in to your hotel. Enjoy a leisurely afternoon with optional visits to nearby cultural sites or the famous local markets. Evening: Relax at the hotel and prepare for the next day’s activities.

Explore Lalibela and Return to Addis Ababa Morning: Guided tour of Lalibela’s UNESCO World Heritage rock-hewn churches, including Bet Giyorgis. Afternoon: Continue exploring Lalibela, focusing on its fascinating history and religious significance. Evening: Fly back to Addis Ababa and transfer to your hotel.

Fly from Addis Ababa to Jinka, Visit Turmi and Karo Tribes Morning: Fly from Addis Ababa to Jinka and meet your guide. Afternoon: Drive to Turmi and visit the Karo villages. Learn about the tribes’ customs, body painting traditions, and way of life. Evening: Overnight stay in Turmi.

Drive to Omorate – Visit Dassanech Tribe and Return to Turmi Morning: Drive to Omorate and cross the Omo River to visit the Dassanech tribe. Discover their pastoral lifestyle and rich culture. Afternoon: Return to Turmi for additional cultural immersion or relaxation. Evening: Overnight stay in Turmi.

Morning Visit to Mursi Tribe – Fly Back to Addis Ababa Morning: Visit the Mursi tribe, known for their lip plates and traditional attire. Enjoy insightful interactions with the tribe members. Afternoon: Drive back to Jinka and fly to Addis Ababa. Evening at leisure in the city.

Fly to Semera – Danakil Depression Morning: Fly to Semera and meet your tour group for the Danakil Depression expedition. Afternoon: Drive to Danakil Depression and set up camp for an unforgettable desert experience. Evening: Overnight camping under the stars.

Visit Dallol Morning: Explore Dallol’s colorful hydrothermal fields, salt formations, and geothermal activity. Afternoon: Continue your adventure with visits to salt mines and surrounding landscapes. Evening: Return to camp for overnight stay.

Visit Danakil and Drive Back to Addis Ababa Morning: Visit additional Danakil highlights, including volcanic craters and camel caravans. Afternoon: Begin the drive back to Semera and then fly to Addis Ababa. Evening: End of tour. Optional Add-On: Lalibela – Omo Valley – Danakil via Mekelle & Tigray Churches. Modify your itinerary to explore the scenic route through Mekelle and the Tigray region. Visit the ancient Tigray rock-hewn churches and learn about their history and architecture. Enhance your cultural journey by combining Lalibela, Omo Valley, and Danakil in one seamless experience.
